function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 through archival data research and literature review","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure and transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to safety protocols, remote work options, and regular testing","Technologies":"Digital collaboration tools, remote communication technologies, and contact tracing apps","People":"Researchers, policy makers, and reviewers involved in the literature review","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies, and academic publishers"},{"Description":"Impact analysis using the IPAT model","Impact":"Risk of oversimplification or overlooking complex factors influencing the impact of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Incorporate multidimensional analysis and consider diverse socio-economic and environmental factors","Technologies":"Data analytics and modeling software, multidimensional impact assessment frameworks","People":"Researchers, data analysts, and policy makers involved in impact analysis","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and data analysis organizations"},{"Description":"Reference to historical plagues and pandemics","Impact":"Potential to invoke fear and anxiety related to past catastrophic events","Mitigation":"Provide contextual understanding and reassurance about advancements in healthcare and disease management","Technologies":"Educational resources, public health communication platforms, and historical data visualization tools","People":"Readers, general public, and individuals affected by past pandemics","Owner":"Education institutions, public health authorities, and historical research organizations"}]}
